items.title: Show HN: SmoothTalk – Practice Cold Approaching and Flirting with Voice AI
items.raw_excerpt: I wanted a way to practice cold approaching, flirting, and keeping conversations flowing when meeting new people at bars or other social settings. I first tried ChatGPT’s voice mode, but it often refused to roleplay these scenarios. I experimented with tools like Vapi and found the practice surprisingly effective. That led me to build a dedicated app for it. I’ve been testing it with friends, and they’ve found it helpful too. It’s now live on iOS TestFlight and Google Play beta. https://www.smoothtalk.app/download Would love feedback from the community. Curious if others find this kind of conversational roleplay useful!

title_i18n.en: Show HN: SmoothTalk – Practice Cold Approaching and Flirting with Voice AI
title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：SmoothTalk – 用语音AI练习搭讪和调情
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: SmoothTalk – Practica el acercamiento en frío y el coqueteo con IA de voz

excerpt_i18n.en: I wanted a way to practice cold approaching, flirting, and keeping conversations flowing when meeting new people at bars or other social settings. I first tried ChatGPT’s voice mode, but it often refused to roleplay these scenarios. I experimented with tools like Vapi and found the practice surprisingly effective. That led me to build a dedicated app for it. I’ve been testing it with friends, and they’ve found it helpful too. It’s now live on iOS TestFlight and Google Play beta. https://www.smoothtalk.app/download Would love feedback from the community. Curious if others find this kind of conversational roleplay useful!
excerpt_i18n.zh: 我想找个方法练习在酒吧或其他社交场合搭讪、调情和保持对话流畅。最初尝试了ChatGPT的语音模式，但它经常拒绝角色扮演。
excerpt_i18n.es: Buscaba una forma de practicar el acercamiento en frío, el coqueteo y mantener fluida la conversación al conocer gente nueva en bares u otros entornos sociales. Primero probé el modo de voz de ChatGPT, pero a menudo se negaba a interpretar esos

items.title: Show HN: Keplar – Voice AI for qualitative research at quantitative scale
items.raw_excerpt:
Hi HN! I'm Dhruv, co-founder of Keplar. After 2.5 years, countless late nights, and many pivots, we're launching Keplar Voice ( https://keplar.io/voice ). The problem: Companies need to understand customers, but real research is painfully slow and expensive. A single moderated interview can cost hundreds of dollars and take weeks to schedule. So everyone defaults to surveys with LOW response rates and makes million-dollar decisions on shallow data. Our solution: AI voice agents that conduct natural, dynamic conversations with hundreds of users simultaneously. Not scripted chatbots - these adapt based on responses, ask follow-ups, and dig deeper. Our analysis agents then code responses, surface patterns, and generate reports automatically. Technical bits that might interest you:
- Voice syn

title_i18n.en: Show HN: Keplar – Voice AI for qualitative research at quantitative scale
title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：Keplar——用于定量规模定性研究的语音人工智能
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: Keplar – IA de voz para investigación cualitativa a escala cuantitativa

excerpt_i18n.en:
Hi HN! I'm Dhruv, co-founder of Keplar. After 2.5 years, countless late nights, and many pivots, we're launching Keplar Voice ( https://keplar.io/voice ). The problem: Companies need to understand customers, but real research is painfully slow and expensive. A single moderated interview can cost hundreds of dollars and take weeks to schedule. So everyone defaults to surveys with LOW response rates and makes million-dollar decisions on shallow data. Our solution: AI voice agents that conduct natural, dynamic conversations with hundreds of users simultaneously. Not scripted chatbots - these adapt based on responses, ask follow-ups, and dig deeper. Our analysis agents then code responses, surface patterns, and generate reports automatically. Technical bits that might interest you:
- Voice syn

items.title: Microsoft Paint is getting its own Photoshop-like project files
items.raw_excerpt: Microsoft has been steadily improving its Paint app for Windows 11 in recent years with a dark mode, transparency and layers, and even AI-powered image creation. Now, Microsoft is adding two new Photoshop-like features to Paint. You’ll soon be able to save your Paint creations as a project file, much like a Photoshop Document (.PSD). […]

title_i18n.en: Microsoft Paint is getting its own Photoshop-like project files
title_i18n.zh: 微软画图将拥有类似Photoshop的专属项目文件。
title_i18n.es: Microsoft Paint está recibiendo sus propios archivos de proyecto similares a Photoshop.

excerpt_i18n.en: Microsoft has been steadily improving its Paint app for Windows 11 in recent years with a dark mode, transparency and layers, and even AI-powered image creation. Now, Microsoft is adding two new Photoshop-like features to Paint. You’ll soon be able to save your Paint creations as a project file, much like a Photoshop Document (.PSD). […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 微软近年来持续改进Windows 11的画图应用，陆续推出深色模式、透明度和图层功能，甚至支持AI图像生成。现在，微软正为其添加两项类似Photoshop的新功能。
excerpt_i18n.es: Microsoft ha estado mejorando constantemente su aplicación Paint para Windows 11 en los últimos años con un modo oscuro, transparencia y capas, e incluso creación de imágenes con IA. Ahora, Microsoft está añadiendo dos nuevas funciones similares a Photoshop

The browser extension is now available in US East (N. Virginia) and US West (Oregon) AWS Regions for Mozilla, Google Chrome, and Microsoft Edge as part of the Lite Subscription.

The browser extension is now available in US East (N. Virginia) and US West (Oregon) AWS Regions for Mozilla, Google Chrome, and Microsoft Edge as part of the Lite Subscription.

excerpt_i18n.es: En esta publicación, mostramos cómo utilizar la extensión de navegador de Amazon Q Business para brindar a tu equipo acceso fluido a información y asistencia impulsada por inteligencia artificial. La extensión de navegador ya está disponible en Este de EE. UU. (Norte de Virginia) y Oeste de EE.

items.title: Build Agentic Workflows with OpenAI GPT OSS on Amazon SageMaker AI and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
items.raw_excerpt: In this post, we show how to deploy gpt-oss-20b model to SageMaker managed endpoints and demonstrate a practical stock analyzer agent assistant example with LangGraph, a powerful graph-based framework that handles state management, coordinated workflows, and persistent memory systems.

title_i18n.en: Build Agentic Workflows with OpenAI GPT OSS on Amazon SageMaker AI and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
title_i18n.zh: 在亚马逊SageMaker AI和亚马逊Bedrock AgentCore上使用OpenAI GPT OSS构建智能工作流。
title_i18n.es: Crea flujos de trabajo agentivos con OpenAI GPT OSS en Amazon SageMaker AI y Amazon Bedrock AgentCore.

excerpt_i18n.en: In this post, we show how to deploy gpt-oss-20b model to SageMaker managed endpoints and demonstrate a practical stock analyzer agent assistant example with LangGraph, a powerful graph-based framework that handles state management, coordinated workflows, and persistent memory systems.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 在这篇文章中，我们展示了如何将gpt-oss-20b模型部署到SageMaker托管端点，并通过LangGraph演示了一个实用的股票分析助手示例，该框架是基于图形的强大工具，用于处理状态。
excerpt_i18n.es: En esta publicación, mostramos cómo desplegar el modelo gpt-oss-20b en endpoints gestionados de SageMaker y demostramos un ejemplo práctico de un agente asistente analizador de acciones con LangGraph, un potente framework basado en grafos que maneja estado.

items.title: ‘Ask Gemini’ AI will tell you what you missed during a Google Meet call
items.raw_excerpt: Google is starting the rollout of its Ask Gemini AI assistant in Google Meet, but it will initially only be available to “select Google Workspace customers.” The assistant can answer participant’s questions by referring to captions generated during the call, resources like Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides they have permission to view, and public websites. […]

items.title: Show HN: AI Virtual Try-On and Garment Design Tool (No Login, Free)
items.raw_excerpt: Hi Hacker News, We're excited to share tryon.aivory.space – an AI-powered virtual try-on and garment design platform we've been building. Our goal is to make high-quality product visualization and custom fashion design accessible to everyone, from indie designers to e-commerce brands, without the typical barriers. What it does: AI Virtual Try-On: Instantly apply custom designs onto trained models, changing poses, angles, and camera views. Custom Garment Creation: Design t-shirts, pants, accessories, and see them rendered on models. AI Image Editor: Fine-tune visuals, create lookbooks, and generate countless design variations. Magazine-Quality Output: Generate professional fashion magazine layouts with PDF print options. Multi-Platform & Accessible: Works seamlessly across web, PC, mobile,

title_i18n.en: Show HN: AI Virtual Try-On and Garment Design Tool (No Login, Free)

title_i18n.es: Muestra HN: Herramienta de IA para Probar Ropa Virtualmente y Diseñar Prendas (Sin Registro, Gratis)

items.raw_excerpt: Today’s creators are equal parts entertainer, producer and gamer, juggling game commentary, scene changes, replay clips, chat moderation and technical troubleshooting — all while trying to play their best. Agentic AI presents huge potential for creators. The technology can power intelligent collaborators that can help cohost, produce or troubleshoot livestreams in real time to make Read Article

excerpt_i18n.en: Today’s creators are equal parts entertainer, producer and gamer, juggling game commentary, scene changes, replay clips, chat moderation and technical troubleshooting — all while trying to play their best. Agentic AI presents huge potential for creators. The technology can power intelligent collaborators that can help cohost, produce or troubleshoot livestreams in real time to make Read Article
excerpt_i18n.zh: 如今的创作者集娱乐者、制作人和玩家于一身，既要进行游戏解说、场景切换、回放剪辑、聊天管理及技术故障排除，同时还要尽力展现最佳操作水平。而代理式人工智能预
excerpt_i18n.es: Los creadores de hoy son a partes iguales entretenedores, productores y jugadores, compaginando comentarios del juego, cambios de escena, clips de repetición, moderación del chat y resolución de problemas técnicos, todo mientras intentan jugar lo mejor posible. La IA agencial pre

items.title: Americans want AI to stay out of their personal lives
items.raw_excerpt: A new study from Pew suggests that Americans aren’t particularly optimistic about AI. A full 50 percent of respondents said they were more concerned than excited about the use of AI in their daily lives. That’s down ever so slightly from 52 percent in 2023, but it’s up significantly from 37 percent in 2021.  Americans […]

title_i18n.en: Americans want AI to stay out of their personal lives
title_i18n.zh: 美国人希望人工智能远离他们的个人生活。
title_i18n.es: Los estadounidenses quieren que la inteligencia artificial se mantenga al margen de sus vidas personales.

excerpt_i18n.en: A new study from Pew suggests that Americans aren’t particularly optimistic about AI. A full 50 percent of respondents said they were more concerned than excited about the use of AI in their daily lives. That’s down ever so slightly from 52 percent in 2023, but it’s up significantly from 37 percent in 2021.  Americans […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 皮尤研究中心的一项新研究显示，美国人对人工智能并不特别乐观。整整50%的受访者表示，他们对日常生活中使用人工智能感到担忧多于兴奋。这一比例较之前有所下降。
excerpt_i18n.es: Un nuevo estudio de Pew sugiere que los estadounidenses no son particularmente optimistas respecto a la inteligencia artificial. Un total del 50 por ciento de los encuestados afirmó estar más preocupado que entusiasmado por el uso de la IA en su vida diaria. Esa cifra ha disminuido ligeramente.

items.title: Gemini achieves gold-level performance at the International Collegiate Programming Contest World Finals
items.raw_excerpt: Advanced version of Gemini 2.5 Deep Think achieved gold-medal level at the 2025 ICPC World Finals.

title_i18n.en: Gemini achieves gold-level performance at the International Collegiate Programming Contest World Finals
title_i18n.zh: 双子星在国际大学生程序设计竞赛世界总决赛中斩获金牌级表现。
title_i18n.es: Géminis alcanza un rendimiento de nivel oro en la Final Mundial del Concurso Internacional Universitario de Programación

excerpt_i18n.en: Advanced version of Gemini 2.5 Deep Think achieved gold-medal level at the 2025 ICPC World Finals.
excerpt_i18n.zh: Gemini 2.5 Deep Think进阶版在2025年ICPC全球总决赛中达到金牌水平。
excerpt_i18n.es: La versión avanzada de Gemini 2.5 Deep Think alcanzó el nivel de medalla de oro en la final mundial de la ICPC de 2025.

items.title: You can soon attend Zoom meetings as your AI avatar
items.raw_excerpt: Zoom’s vision of filling meetings with AI clones has nearly arrived. On Wednesday, the video conferencing app announced that you’ll soon be able to create a “photorealistic” avatar of yourself in case you aren’t “camera-ready.” That means your AI avatar can appear polished if you’ve just crawled out of bed. Zoom plans on launching this […]

title_i18n.en: You can soon attend Zoom meetings as your AI avatar
title_i18n.zh: 你很快就能以AI虚拟形象参加Zoom会议了。
title_i18n.es: Pronto podrás asistir a reuniones de Zoom con tu avatar de IA.

excerpt_i18n.en: Zoom’s vision of filling meetings with AI clones has nearly arrived. On Wednesday, the video conferencing app announced that you’ll soon be able to create a “photorealistic” avatar of yourself in case you aren’t “camera-ready.” That means your AI avatar can appear polished if you’ve just crawled out of bed. Zoom plans on launching this […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: Zoom用AI克隆体填充会议室的愿景已近在咫尺。周三，这款视频会议应用宣布即将推出"照片级真实感"虚拟化身功能，让用户在不想开摄像头时也能以数字化身参会。
excerpt_i18n.es: La visión de Zoom de llenar las reuniones con clones de IA casi ha llegado. El miércoles, la aplicación de videoconferencias anunció que pronto podrás crear un avatar "fotorrealista" de ti mismo por si no estás "ante la cámara".

items.title: Launch HN: RunRL (YC X25) – Reinforcement learning as a service
items.raw_excerpt: Hey HN, we’re Andrew and Derik at RunRL ( https://runrl.com/ ). We've built a platform to improve models and agents with reinforcement learning. If you can define a metric, we'll make your model or agent better, without you having to think about managing GPU clusters. Here's a demo video: https://youtu.be/EtiBjs4jfCg I (Andrew) was doing a PhD in reinforcement learning on language models, and everyone kept...not using RL because it was too hard to get running. At some point I realized that someone's got to sit down and actually write a good platform for running RL experiments. Once this happened, people started using it for antiviral design, formal verification, browser agents, and a bunch of other cool applications, so we decided to make a startup out of it. How it works: - Choose an open

title_i18n.en: Launch HN: RunRL (YC X25) – Reinforcement learning as a service
title_i18n.zh: HN发布：RunRL（YC X25）——强化学习即服务
title_i18n.es: Lanzamiento HN: RunRL (YC X25) — Aprendizaje por refuerzo como servicio

excerpt_i18n.en: Hey HN, we’re Andrew and Derik at RunRL ( https://runrl.com/ ). We've built a platform to improve models and agents with reinforcement learning. If you can define a metric, we'll make your model or agent better, without you having to think about managing GPU clusters. Here's a demo video: https://youtu.be/EtiBjs4jfCg I (Andrew) was doing a PhD in reinforcement learning on language models, and everyone kept...not using RL because it was too hard to get running. At some point I realized that someone's got to sit down and actually write a good platform for running RL experiments. Once this happened, people started using it for antiviral design, formal verification, browser agents, and a bunch of other cool applications, so we decided to make a startup out of it. excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好，我们是RunRL（https://runrl.com/）的Andrew和Derik。我们开发了一个通过强化学习优化模型和智能体的平台。只要您能定义评估指标，我们就能无需额外操作直接提升您的模型或智能体性能。
